com.michaelxdubois.decisiontree

Class DecisionTree<D extends DataSet<D,E,L,K>,E extends com.michaelxdubois.decisiontree.DataSet.ILabeledData<L,K>,L extends java.lang.Comparable<L>,K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.michaelxdubois.decisiontree.DecisionTree<D,E,L,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - class type of child class of DataSet (extends DataSet)
    E - class type of data (must extend DecisionTree.ILabeledData)
    L - class type of labels (must extend Comparable).
    K - class type of feature values (must extend Comparable)

    public class DecisionTree<D extends DataSet<D,E,L,K>,E extends com.michaelxdubois.decisiontree.DataSet.ILabeledData<L,K>,L extends java.lang.Comparable<L>,K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic discrete decision tree. This tree is designed to work with any number of discrete labels and any number of discrete feature values so long as the full range of possible values is uniformly-typed and included in your subclass of the accompanying generic DataSet class. Note: If you extend this class, you will have to reimplment/override the static methods for your child class.

    • Method Detail

      • buildTunedTree

        public static <D extends DataSet<D,E,L,K>,E extends com.michaelxdubois.decisiontree.DataSet.ILabeledData<L,K>,L extends java.lang.Comparable<L>,K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>> DecisionTree<D,E,L,K> buildTunedTree(D dataSet,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        int tuningMethod,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        int tuningSizeOrStride)
        Builds and tunes a tree using the specified tuning method. TUNING_BY_SIZE interprets `tuningOrSize` as the size of the tuning data set and divides the `dataSet` accordingly. TUNING_BY_STRIDE interprets `tuningOrSize` as the stride with which to pluck tuning data out of the training set
        Parameters:
        dataSet - - a dataset
        tuningMethod - - the predefined method to split tuning data out by
        tuningSizeOrStride - - either the size of the tuning set or the stride with which to pick out tuning data
        Returns:
        a tuned DecisionTree

      • nFoldCrossValidate

        public static <D extends DataSet<D,E,L,K>,E extends com.michaelxdubois.decisiontree.DataSet.ILabeledData<L,K>,L extends java.lang.Comparable<L>,K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>> double nFoldCrossValidate(D dataSet,
                                                                                                                                                                                             int n,
                                                                                                                                                                                             int tuningMethod,
                                                                                                                                                                                             int tuningSizeOrStride)
        Cross-validates a tuned tree by creating `dataSet.size() - n` similar trees using the supplied dataSet minus `n` elements and testing each tree against the remaining `n` elements.
        Type Parameters:
        D - a subclass of DataSet
        E - classtype of data, a subclass of DataSet.ILabeledData
        L - classtype of labels, a subclass of Comparable
        K - classtype of feature values, subclass of Comparable
        Parameters:
        dataSet - - the full dataSet with which to run tests
        n - - the size of the folds
        tuningMethod - - the tuning method with which to tune test trees see DecisionTree.tuneTree() for details
        tuningSizeOrStride - - the size or stride of tuning data set

      • testTree

        public static <T extends DecisionTree<D,E,L,K>,D extends DataSet<D,E,L,K>,E extends com.michaelxdubois.decisiontree.DataSet.ILabeledData<L,K>,L extends java.lang.Comparable<L>,K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>> double testTree(T testTree,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   D testingDataSet)
        Cross-validates a tuned tree by creating `dataSet.size() - n` similar trees using the supplied dataSet minus `n` elements and testing each tree against the remaining `n` elements.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a subclass of DecisionTree
        D - a subclass of DataSet
        E - classtype of data, a subclass of DataSet.ILabeledData
        L - classtype of labels, a subclass of Comparable
        K - classtype of feature values, subclass of Comparable
        Parameters:
        testTree - - the tree to test
        testingDataSet - - the DataSet to test against

      • tuneTree

        public static <D extends DataSet<D,E,L,K>,E extends com.michaelxdubois.decisiontree.DataSet.ILabeledData<L,K>,L extends java.lang.Comparable<L>,K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>> void tuneTree(DecisionTree<D,E,L,K> tree,
                                                                                                                                                                                 D tuningDataSet)
        Tunes the given tree by pruning nodes and testing against the given `tuningDataSet`.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a subclass of DecisionTree
        D - a subclass of DataSet
        E - classtype of data, a subclass of DataSet.ILabeledData
        L - classtype of labels, a subclass of Comparable
        K - classtype of feature values, subclass of Comparable
        Parameters:
        tree - - the tree to tune
        tuningDataSet - - the DataSet to tune against
